Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 54th/Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at 54th/Cermak.
 
Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.
 
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
 
Allow extra travel time.
